AboutMe.Title: About Me
AboutMe.Paragraph1: I'm Stefano a native spanish native speaker. That at the moment works for Infragistics in English.
AboutMe.Paragraph2: This is my first time working in another language and happily doing it since the past {{years}} years. Even though I knew how to communicate in English this was a challenge at first, but an enjoyable challenge.
AboutMe.Paragraph4: On Infragistics been on the role of full-stack developer, I'm mostly focused on front end task.
AboutMe.Paragraph5: Neither way, also contribute on the back end, and doing some tasks on salesforce CRM.
